topics.body:
Hey guys out of curiosity, but with all the new seasons and stuff, why the heck was there no revamp of FoE? I mean seriously no one wonders how the heck the Crystal Empire or even Sunset Shimmer fit into the whole course of events of history or the fact that there's now an official map of Equestria which was made available? 

I'd love it if someone did something different, than what's been previously established, also I hate memory orbs, those things are really annoying to read about.

And the author actually will need to change *everything* to fit with the now actual MLP.

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5449bd136368723e6e570200#post_5449bd136368723e6e570200
If someone did something similar and revamped the story from what Kkat did, I have no problems, that ending that was written seemed a little half-hearted, there were so many plot holes at the end. 
Also it seemed like it ended on a way too 'light' kinda ending, as if everything was going to get better from then on. 

I'd have liked it if it turned out more like FoE: 2 or 1, and then she could have tried for a sequel, but I guess that's not going to happen. 

Anyway, I think there's a lot more stuff they could add in, since there's a ton more content which can add some interesting aspects. Also having discord play a non-villain role would be interesting, if he was neutral, and he still tricked ponies. That'd be in character for him. 

Or like Sombra, or Queen Chrysalis, there's a lot of stuff to add in which would make interesting content, no shipping or heavy shipping required.

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5449bf926368722e8d0f0000#post_5449bf926368722e8d0f0000
That would be a lot of things, and I don't know if revamping will be a good thing. Everyone likes how is now, and a complete change of all the fic will not be the same.  That's why side stories are for. Also the ending, well I haven't reached to the ending, so I don't much of it.

There waa actually a plan to continue the original fic with FoE:2, but something happened and the fic will not be made.

Like I said, Discord appeared in Proyect Horizonts as neutral, but he waa in "statue state". [spoiler]He got his freedom thanks by Blackjack and in the end, he kiss her...yes.
..and disappears.[/spoiler]

In my opinion, I prefer Fallout Equestria how it is, without changes. Most new changes in MLP are pure merchandise.
